function dieAndSendETH(address payable receiver) public {

vulnerability_findings.message: Suicidal.dieAndSendETH (Suicidal.sol#10-12) allows anyone to destruct the contract

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in Suicidal.sol:
	- pragma solidity0.6.10 (Suicidal.sol#3): it allows old versions

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))

vulnerability_findings.name: Unprotected Selfdestruct (SWC 106)
vulnerability_findings.message:
Any sender can cause the contract to self-destruct.
Any sender can trigger execution of the SELFDESTRUCT instruction to destroy this contract account and withdraw its balance to an arbitrary address. Review the transaction trace generated for this issue and make sure that appropriate security controls are in place to prevent unrestricted access.
Classification: SWC-106
